channel.title: Problems with Torvapkz 637
channel.description:
Getting this error..
Ftw!
[code][Cache] Loading cache... [Cache] Loaded cache! [MapXTEA] Loaded 1502 map XTEA key(s) [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 60 packet handlers. [World] Loading World... [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [ClanManager] Loaded 47 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... [AreaManager] Loaded 48 areas. [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 2649 drops [SpellContainer] Loading magic spells... [SpellContainer] Loaded 43 magic spell handlers. [SpecialAttackContainer] Loading special attacks... [SpecialAttackContainer] Loaded 37 special attacks. [DialogueManager] Loading dialogues... [DialogueManager] Loaded 35 dialogues. [DialogueManager] Loading NPC dialogue ids... [DialogueManager] Loaded 1 NPC dialogue ids. [ShopManager] Loaded 33 Shops [ObjectManager] Loading objects... [ObjectManager] Loaded 31 objects. [ItemDefinition] Loading item definitions... [ItemDefinition] Loaded 20430 item definitions. [RangeWeapon] Loading range weapon info... [RangeWeapon] Loaded 184 range weapon definitions. [Ammunition] Loading range ammunition info... [Ammunition] Loaded 219 ammunition definitions. [NPCDefinition] Loading npc definitions... [NPCDefinition] Loaded 13488 npc definitions. [NPCLoader] Loading customized NPC classes... [NPCLoader] Loaded 86 customized NPCs. [NPCLoader] Loading default npc spawns... [NPCLoader] Loaded 3736 default npc spawns. [EventManager] Loading event listeners... [EventManager] Loaded 27 interface listeners and 319 object listeners. [DementhiumShutdownHook] Shutdown hook initialized! org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelException: Failed to bind to: 0.0.0.0/0.0.0.0:435 94 at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap.bind(ServerBootstrap.java:3 03) at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap.bind(ServerBootstrap.java:2 53) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.bind(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:121) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:62) Caused by: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketChannelImpl.java: 126) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdaptor.java:59) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketPipelineSink.bind(N ioServerSocketPipelineSink.java:146) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketPipelineSink.handle ServerSocket(NioServerSocketPipelineSink.java:100) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketPipelineSink.eventS unk(NioServerSocketPipelineSink.java:74) at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.bind(Channels.java:468) at org.jboss.netty.channel.AbstractChannel.bind(AbstractChannel.java:192 ) at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap$Binder.channelOpen(ServerBo otstrap.java:348) at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.fireChannelOpen(Channels.java:176) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketChannel.<init>(NioS erverSocketChannel.java:85) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketChannelFactory.newC hannel(NioServerSocketChannelFactory.java:142) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketChannelFactory.newC hannel(NioServerSocketChannelFactory.java:1) at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap.bind(ServerBootstrap.java:2 82) ... 3 more [RS2ServerBootstrap] Uncaught exception has occured [ImpetuousImpulses] Spawned all implings: puro-puro count: 44, world count: 22 [DementhiumShutdownHook] Shutting down Dementhium... [DementhiumShutdownHook] Preparing players for shutdown... [DementhiumShutdownHook] Players saved. [DementhiumShutdownHook] Saving clans... java.io.FileNotFoundException: root\xml\clans.xml (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:194) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:84) at org.dementhium.io.XMLHandler.toXML(XMLHandler.java:45) at org.dementhium.DementhiumShutdownHook.run(DementhiumShutdownHook.java :67) [DementhiumShutdownHook] Saving punishments... java.io.FileNotFoundException: root\xml\ipmutes.xml (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:194) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:84) at org.dementhium.io.XMLHandler.toXML(XMLHandler.java:45) at org.dementhium.content.misc.PunishHandler.save(PunishHandler.java:117 ) at org.dementhium.DementhiumShutdownHook.run(DementhiumShutdownHook.java :74) [DementhiumShutdownHook] Saved punishments. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Need some help with this..

item.title: Problems with Torvapkz 637
item.dc:creator: @mickie456 mickie456
item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

or use another random port:p

i prefer 43595 cuz it looks like 43594

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Torvapkz 637
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

even if you dont have utorrent something else could be running on port 43594 try portforwarding 5555 or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Torvapkz 637
item.dc:creator: @PureQuintinScape PureQuintinScape
item.description:
@PureQuintinScape wrote:

Don’t have uTorrent but i’ll try to restart…

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Torvapkz 637
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

that commonly happens if your running something else thats running on the same port your trying to run on.

Try closing uTorrent or anything else that may interfere. if that dont work try restarting your computer and then try closing the programs again. if that dont work idk. because i had that when i worked on my 637 and i just exited a bunch of programs and it worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Torvapkz 637
item.dc:creator: @PureQuintinScape PureQuintinScape
item.description:
@PureQuintinScape wrote:

Well, that didn’t help much, but still looking for someone to help

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Torvapkz 637
item.dc:creator: @MrRspsMan MrRspsMan
item.description:
@MrRspsMan wrote:

i always get that error so i just delete it Lol
